boardgame.name: Rapa Nui
boardgame.description: Translated game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Plunge into a mysterious culture at the other end of the world - Rapa Nui, Easter Island!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Become a powerful tribal chief and decide which valuable tribe members will next serve your village: loggers, priests or hunters and gatherers? Or would you rather erect an impressive stone statue more valuable than anything else?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game system is refined and novel: Take one card from the general display and reveal the card lying underneath _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; which could be disastrous for all! Only those who make the right decisions and win a little favor from the gods will lead his tribe to eternal glory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: German Kosmos Edition

Brand new in shrink wrap. One of the best games of 2011 Spiel Messe. #6 on Fairplay!! Step into the shoes of tribal chief at the Eastern Island and lead your folk to the glory of rich and fruitful life. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not as easy as you think. Get this game and find out for yoursel! I will ship immediately and will ship worldwide. ____________________________________________________________ If you buy THIS game and pick ANOTHER game from my marketplace, I will take $2 off THIS game AND $2 off the other game. On additional games I will take another $1 off for each game.
